question: Could i get my period in a couple of days?
question_content: This week has been strane for me igot cramps in my stomach for two days and then a huge mood swing( crying three times a day and during my basketball practice and yelling the heads off my friends) . I am 12 and had a discharge for 8-9 months annd my discharhe has reduced.

answers.answer_content: Possibly, but then it is more likely to be just normal teenage stuff. Was the pain right in the middle of your stomach, like stomach ache, because if so, that was probably stomach ache. With period pains, it's very distinct. Also, with the discharge, that's a sign that tells me it might not be your period, because leading up to your period, your body produces more estrogen and so discharge is likely to increase slightly, then again saying that, every body works differently and has different experiences, so I can't say for definite. The best thing you can be is prepared, so have the necessary stuff in your bag (spare pants, towel), just in case you get caught unawares by mother nature! You might want to wear a skirt too, just in case it does come, and it leaks through your pants onto your trousers. At least with a skirt, you've got some chance of saving yourself some embarrassment! I always do when I know I'm about to start

Maybe, but when you do get cramps, you should start bleeding right when they start, or within twenty minutes. Menstrual cramps are when your uterus contracts and squeezes its lining out of your system, thus a period. If it hurt just below your sternum, then it wasn't period cramps. Carry around some liners though, just incase.
